chunk:
ZealSea Hyaluronic Acid Serum

Brand: ZealSea

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua, Butylene glycol, Glycereth-26, Trehalose, Pentylene glycol, Sodium hyaluronate, 1,2-hexanediol, Allantoin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Dipotassium glycyrrhizate, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Sodium acetylated hyaluronate, Sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer, Glucose, Hydrolyzed sodium

Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Dipotassium glycyrrhizate, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Sodium acetylated hyaluronate, Sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer, Glucose, Hydrolyzed sodium hyaluronate.
Directions: Every morning and evening, apply 2-3 drops of serum to thoroughly cleansed skin and massage from the inside of your face working outwards, avoiding the eye area.

Warnings: 1. Store it in a dry and cool place, avoid the direct sun exposure.
2. If any discomfort or allergic symptom occurs, please discontinue using immediately and consult a doctor if necessary.
3. Keep out of children.
